title: How I Opened My Heart to God's Big Dreams
description:
Matthew West, renowned singer and songwriter, joins Sadie in studio to discuss fully trusting the Lord amid trials and tribulations, how skydiving gave Sadie a new perspective on life, and the story behind "Gobble Gobble," Matthew's hit Thanksgiving song. Matthew also drops some serious wisdom about why we should stop striving and learn the importance of silence, stillness, solitude, and prayer. We say in prayer and song that we love and trust God, but when it comes down to it, do we fully believe that?
-
